member.name: T:GreenEnergyHub.Messaging.HandlerExtensions
member.summary: Static class which allows the Azure Functions runtime IServiceCollection to discover and register classes needed to run the Green Energy Hub project.

member.name: M:GreenEnergyHub.Messaging.HandlerExtensions.AddGreenEnergyHub(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Searches the provided assemblies, as well as the common assemblies, to find the HubRequestHandlers, HubCommandHandlers, IHubMessages, IRuleEngines, the rules (represented as a list of Types), the IEndpointResolver, and the IHubMessageTypeMap, and to automatically register and provide this instances on function startup.
member.param: The IServiceCollection services provided by the Azure Functions runtime to register our interfaces with.
A list of assemblies to search for interfaces to automatically register.
